update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
strName = #{strname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intTypeId = #{inttypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
intUserMajor = #{intusermajor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
intUserDepartment = #{intuserdepartment,jdbcType=INTEGER},

strPhone = #{strphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
strMail = #{strmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where intId = #{intid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strName = #{strname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intTypeId = #{inttypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intUserMajor = #{intusermajor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intUserDepartment = #{intuserdepartment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, strStuNum = #{strstunum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strPhone = #{strphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strMail = #{strmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dateRegTime = #{dateregtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where intId = #{intid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from user
intId = #{intid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
strName = #{strname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
intTypeId = #{inttypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
intUserMajor = #{intusermajor,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
intUserDepartment = #{intuserdepartment,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
strStuNum = #{strstunum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
strPhone = #{strphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
strMail= #{strmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
dateRegTime = #{dateregtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND
select count(intId) from user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(intId) from user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and intId != #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into user ( username, password, strName, intTypeId,intUserMajor,intUserDepartment, strStuNum, strPhone, strMail, dateRegTime) values ( #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inttypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intusermajor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intuserdepartment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{strstunum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateregtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select intId, username, strName, intTypeId, intUserMajor,intUserDepartment, strStuNum, strPhone, strMail, dateRegTime from user order by intId asc limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(intId) from user where intUserMajor = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} or intUserDepartment = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(intId) from user where intTypeId = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
